economic_crisis_start.title: Merchant's Desperate Plea
economic_crisis_start.description: In the Prism Galleria's outer markets, trader Kess grabs your sleeve: 'The Cartel's price-fixing has destroyed us! They're selling crystals below cost to bankrupt independents, then they'll control everything. Five trading families have lost everything this week. If this continues, only the Cartel will remainâ€”and they'll own us all.'

choices.text: 'Show me the evidence of price manipulation.'
'I'll speak with the Cartel leadership directly.'
'What if independent traders formed a cooperative?'
'Let me assess the situation from other angles first.'
